backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining file, folder, mission, and user profile types with storage, authorization mixins, mission persistence state, and diagnostic/health query methods.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that carries forward persistent mission state from a previous actor without transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing mission‑related autosave and state‑sync features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation of the creation and validation of a Draft baseline synced exactly to Live version 114 with strict no‑change policy.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, PWA settings, and the app root.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Post‑restoration freeze notice outlining that no code changes are allowed until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first fetch, and cache cleanup.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming frontend restoration to Live version 114 with detailed verification of authentication, UI, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling intro logic, authentication state, and providers.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing classified actor initialization errors with retry and logout options.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Draws a subtle fixed bottom line for visual decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog that warns when a file can't be opened in a new window and offers retry or download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog showing file previews based on type with actions for opening, downloading, moving, or deleting files.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Component handling file uploads and link submissions with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders view, with optional disabled and overlay states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder management interface supporting creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation and actions like delete, download, share, and external open.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Gallery view for files with touch long‑press selection, file thumbnails, and viewer/download handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth actions, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Splash intro screen showing an animated icon that fades out before continuing.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link can't auto‑open, offering retry or copy options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button for Internet Identity with loading state feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor with autosave, tasks, attachments, and file viewer support.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task list management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list UI with creation, selection, swipe actions, and deletion logic including animations and progress calculation.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that displays children only in a mobile-styled container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving files into it, with loading states and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files into folders or back to the main collection, with loading and processing controls.
Swipeable row component enabling edit/delete actions with gesture handling, thresholds, and open-state management.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing total progress and item count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with target-themed graphic and login button, presenting the app's onboarding message.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides a context for creating and managing a backend actor with retry logic, error classification, and optional admin-token initialization.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages upload batches, progress updates, and completion using batched animation-frame updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor via react-query based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and loads stored identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer like touch input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced mission autosaving with queued updates and mission-switch reset handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: File contains no content to summarize.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders, including folder creation with caching and concurrency controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI color systems.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home screen logic, handling auth state, folder/mission UI toggles, data fetching, and optional smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization error messages and utilities for classifying backend connection errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities to open external URLs with popup detection and to download files via blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how a file should be opened—viewer, office preview, or download—based on MIME category.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type, checks previewability, and returns human-readable file type labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides optional performance timing utilities enabled via URL or localStorage, with helpers to measure async operations.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Tools for inspecting React Query mission cache state and logging delete mutation lifecycle details.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs end‑to‑end smoke tests for folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verification using backend APIs.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter to control parallel async operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for consistency and drift detection.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing mission task auto-save issues, requirements, and feature requests.
